branchCategory.name: C(D)Q2*S-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Anti-lateral Load
branchCategory.description: High lateral load version of the standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder allows for higher side loads that the standard CQ2. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 32mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

breadCrumb.name: C(D)Q2*S-Z,Anti-lateral Load w/Auto Sw Mounting Groove
